dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_COLINF2031510
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT COL_MBL_NO COL_MBL_NO_COM,SMS_LBL SMS_LBL_COM,COL_NM COL_NM_COM FROM TAMCOLLT WHERE (USR_NO =? AND COL_MBL_NO =?) OR (? is not null AND USR_NO =? AND SMS_LBL =?) OR (? is not null AND USR_NO =? AND COL_NM =?)) A LIMIT 0,1

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_NEW2031560
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT COL_NM,COL_MBL_NO,SMS_LBL,COL_FLG FROM TAMCOLLT WHERE (? is null OR COL_NM like ?) AND (? is null OR COL_MBL_NO like ?) AND (trim(RCT_DTTM) > '19700101000000') AND USR_NO =? ORDER BY RCT_DTTM DESC,RCT_CNT DESC) A LIMIT 0,10

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_NEW2031561
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT COL_NM,COL_MBL_NO,SMS_LBL,COL_FLG FROM TAMCOLLT WHERE (? is null OR COL_NM like ?) AND (? is null OR COL_MBL_NO like ?) AND (trim(RCT_DTTM) > '19700101000000') AND USR_NO =? ORDER BY RCT_DTTM DESC,RCT_CNT DESC) A LIMIT 0,10

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_COLINF2031510_0
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT COL_USR_NO COL_USR_NO_COM,SMS_LBL SMS_LBL_COM,COL_NM COL_NM_COM FROM TAMCOLLT WHERE (USR_NO =? AND COL_USR_NO =?) OR (? != '' AND USR_NO =? AND SMS_LBL =?) OR (? != '' AND USR_NO =? AND COL_NM =?) LIMIT 0,1

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_NEW2031560_0
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT A.COL_NM,A.COL_MBL_NO,A.SMS_LBL,A.COL_FLG FROM TAMCOLLT A LEFT JOIN URMTPINF B ON A.COL_USR_NO = B.USR_NO WHERE (HEMPTY(?) OR A.COL_NM like ?) AND (HEMPTY(?) OR A.COL_MBL_NO like ?) AND (trim(A.RCT_DTTM) > '19700101000000') AND B.USR_STS ='0' AND A.USR_NO =? ORDER BY A.RCT_DTTM DESC,A.RCT_CNT DESC) C LIMIT 0,10

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_NEW2031561_0
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT A.COL_NM,A.COL_MBL_NO,A.SMS_LBL,A.COL_FLG FROM TAMCOLLT A LEFT JOIN URMTPINF B ON A.COL_USR_NO = B.USR_NO WHERE (? is null OR A.COL_NM like ?) AND (? is null OR A.COL_MBL_NO like ?) AND (trim(A.RCT_DTTM) > '19700101000000') AND B.USR_STS ='0' AND A.USR_NO =? ORDER BY A.RCT_DTTM DESC,A.RCT_CNT DESC) C LIMIT 0,10

dynSentence.name: QRY_TBKCOLLT_ALL1
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.COL_NM , A.BAK_MBL_NO,A.BANK_CARD_NO,A.BANK_NO,B.USR_OPR_LOG_ID FROM TBKCOLLT A,URMTOPER B WHERE A.USR_NO=? AND B.USR_OPR_ID=CONVERT(A.MBL_NO,CHAR) AND (A.COL_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',?),'%') OR ? IS NULL) AND (A.BAK_MBL_NO like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',?),'%') OR ? IS NULL)

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_COLINF_AddContact
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT COL_USR_NO COL_USR_NO_COM,SMS_LBL SMS_LBL_COM,COL_NM COL_NM_COM,RCT_CNT FROM TAMCOLLT WHERE USR_NO =? AND COL_USR_NO =?) A LIMIT 0,1

dynSentence.name: QRY_TAMCOLLT_ALL1
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.COL_NM , A.COL_MBL_NO,B.USR_OPR_LOG_ID FROM TAMCOLLT A,URMTOPER B WHERE A.USR_NO=? AND A.COL_MBL_NO=B.USR_OPR_ID AND (A.COL_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',?),'%') OR HEMPTY(?)) AND (A.COL_MBL_NO like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',?),'%') OR ? IS NULL)
